feedback: Specific actionable suggestion for delivery improvement: Be mindful of your pace, as it can sometimes be fast-paced, making it hard to follow.
Specific actionable suggestion for content enhancement: Provide more specific examples of how you applied your technical skills in your projects to demonstrate their impact and effectiveness.
Specific actionable suggestion for structure improvement: Break up the introduction into sections (e.g., education, skills, experience, career goals) to make it easier for listeners to follow.

grading_debug.notes: The candidate effectively showcases their technical skills and experiences in the given transcript, but could benefit from slowing down their delivery pace and providing more specific examples of project impacts.
